attributes.action: commission a doormen policy at 'Out of the Vaults' in Leicester to prevent access to the drunkingly stupid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these days of Carbon footprints and eco-friendly initiatives, I am proposing the prevention of admission to members of the public to the above named establishment after the consumption of alcohol anywhere else. Admittance under such circumstances renders the patron powerless to avoid drinking the most ridiculous of drinks, in often vastly over-sized portions.
The money saved from this proposal (and the money spent on such beverages)will enable me to purchase a fully-fitted hospital each month to support other 'victims' of the vaults resident devil - Paul 'evil-eye'.
I thank you.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
